title: Freelance Software Developer
description: Providing technical guidance, contributing to diverse projects, and expanding my skill set.
details: Consulted on battery optimization control software, guiding procedures, software development standards, memory management, and debugging practices to enhance developer proficiency.
Developed web tools using Rust API with Typescript React, enabling interactive visualization of simulations.
Engineered AI-driven tools for RPG storytelling, generating world-building content and narrative data to enhance immersion.
